item.title: Half a dozen passage lights not working....., 28th June
item.description:
The passageways leading to Monument station are very dark, at least 6 lights are not working (with 5 in a row out) and the remaining ‘working’ lights are so filled with soot they look like they’ve never been cleaned and give out less than half the light they should. I took the photos on a sunny day, so it was quite bright, but at night time the passageways are so poorly lit they feel unsafe.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 24-28, King William Street, City of London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: All out - three or more street lights in a row

item.title: Volkswagen still in same spot hasn’t moved in 3 months, tyres are all flat has this been dumped?, 28th June
item.description:
There are not many parking spaces on rowley avenue as it is and this vehicle has been abandoned there for over 3 months all the tyres are flat and it hasn’t moved an inch in all this time. There aren’t enough spaces in rowley avenue as it is and there will be less now we have a HMO coming soon so can someone please move it or check why it’s been sitting there for months is someone living in it??
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Rowley Avenue, Blendon, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping near garbage shed, 28th June
item.description:
Someone has left a large rug on the street instead of disposing of it properly in the designated garbage shed. Additionally, there is a dog waste bag left behind at the same location. Unfortunately, this type of behaviour has become a recurring issue.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Celandine Drive, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Vehicle parking - obstruction or illegal, 28th June
item.description:
Next to the Self-storages Parking behind 14 and 15 Bush court crown Lane, N14 5EY. He goes back and forth every day and always parks in the same place. He also often sleeps in his car and in the same place. He does not live there and does not have a Residential Parking Permit.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Crown Lane, Southgate, London
Report on FixMyStreet
